channel.title: New class [Lunatic]
channel.description:
â€¢Lunatic
>Faction - Neutral >Class - Killer
> **Lore**: _The lunatic is a killer that grows stronger as he lives on. He likes to observe his pray learning more about them_
>Notes: You will start out the game as a level 1 killer. When you get the amount of kills needed to upgrade then you will atomaticly upgrade into the next level. > >**Level 1** - starts game. Needs 2 kills to got to next level >**Level 2** - needs 5 kills to go to the next level >**Level** **3** - final level.
>â€¢**Level 1** ðŸ‘¥ > >**Passive 1:** >**_Back stabber_** - kill anyone who attempsnto occu or redirect you, You are also night immune. > >**Day Ability 1:** _**Close watcher**_ - discover a players class type _(unlimited uses)_ > >**Night ability 1:** **_Drawing smiley faces_** - Select a player to draw a smile on, killing them._(unlimited uses)_ [the lunatic prefers to draw smiley faces on the victims hearts]
>â€¢ **Level 2**ðŸ‘¥ > >**Passive 1:** _**Back stabber**_ - kill anyone who try's to occu or redirect you, You are also night immune. > >**Day Ability 1:** **_Close watcher_** - Find a players class type (_unlimited uses)_ > >**Day Ability 2:** **_Quick learner_** - Discover a players faction (_unlimited uses)_ > >**Night ability 1:** **_Drawing smiley faces_** - Select a player to draw a smile on, killing them._(unlimited uses)_ [the lunatic prefers to draw smiley faces on the victims hearts] > >**Night ability 2:** _**Craving blood**_ - make 2 players bleed. If any of them die then if will count as a kill towards your progression towards the next level. (_2 uses)_ >
>â€¢**Level 3** ðŸ‘¥ > >**Passive 1:** **_Back stabber_** - kill anyone who try's to occu or redirect you,You are also night immune. > >**Day Ability 1:** **_Stalk_** - discover a players faction and class type. (_Unlimited uses)_ > >**Day Ability 2:** **_Quick learner_** - When you kill tonight, gain that players passive,If they have one. _(2 uses)_. When successful once, you **cannot** use this ability again > >**Night ability 1:** **_Multi stabber_** - Kill a player and anyone who visits that player will bleed _(unlimited uses)_ > >**Night ability 2:** _**silent footsteps**_ - Kill a player in silent,meaning you will not be noticed by an observer. Also you will appear as class type investigative and BD to all you investigates you. ( _2 uses)_
>**Win condition:** murder all the main factions
**Strategy** - there is a lot of ways to blend in and disguise yourself. So use that to the best of your ability.
Tell me what you think and if this is too over powered or under powered.

item.title: New class [Lunatic]
item.dc:creator: NOBLE1
item.description:
â€¢Lunatic

Faction - Neutral
Class - Killer

Lore: The lunatic is a killer that grows stronger as he lives on. He likes to observe his pray learning more about them

Notes:
You will start out the game as a level 1 killer. When you get the amount of kills needed to upgrade then you will atomaticly upgrade into the next level.

Level 1 - starts game. Needs 2 kills to got to next level
Level 2 - needs 5 kills to go to the next level
Level 3 - final level.

â€¢Level 1

Passive 1:
Back stabber - kill anyone who attempsnto occu or redirect you, You are also night immune.

Day Ability 1:
Close watcher - discover a players class type (unlimited uses)

Night ability 1:
Drawing smiley faces - Select a player to draw a smile on, killing them.(unlimited uses) [the lunatic prefers to draw smiley faces on the victims hearts]

â€¢ Level 2

Passive 1:
Back stabber - kill anyone who tryâ€™s to occu or redirect you, You are also night immune.

Day Ability 1:
Close watcher - Find a players class type (unlimited uses)

Day Ability 2:
Quick learner - Discover a players faction (unlimited uses)

Night ability 1:
Drawing smiley faces - Select a player to draw a smile on, killing them.(unlimited uses) [the lunatic prefers to draw smiley faces on the victims hearts]

Night ability 2:
Craving blood - make 2 players bleed. If any of them die then if will count as a kill towards your progression towards the next level. (2 uses)

â€¢Level 3

Passive 1:
Back stabber - kill anyone who tryâ€™s to occu or redirect you,You are also night immune.

Day Ability 1:
Stalk - discover a players faction and class type. (Unlimited uses)

Day Ability 2:
Quick learner - When you kill tonight, gain that players passive,If they have one. (2 uses). When successful once, you cannot use this ability again

Night ability 1:
Multi stabber - Kill a player and anyone who visits that player will bleed (unlimited uses)

Night ability 2:
silent footsteps - Kill a player in silent,meaning you will not be noticed by an observer. Also you will appear as class type investigative and BD to all you investigates you. ( 2 uses)

Win condition: murder all the main factions

Strategy - there is a lot of ways to blend in and disguise yourself. So use that to the best of your ability.

Tell me what you think and if this is too over powered or under powered.

Read full topic
